import React, { useState } from "react" const RegisterPage = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [repassword, setRepassword] = useState("") const [displayname, setDisplayname] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState({ error: false, message: "" }) const handRegister = async (e) => { alert(username+ password, repassword, displayname) } return (
Tạo tài khoản
setDisplayname(e.target.value)} value={displayname} id="displayname" className=" form-control" type="text" placeholder="Tên hiển thị" />
setUsername(e.target.value)} value={username} id="username" className=" form-control" type="text" placeholder="Tên đăng nhập" />
setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password} id="password" className=" form-control" type="text" placeholder="Mật khẩu" />
setRepassword(e.target.value)} value={repassword} id="repassword" className=" form-control" type="text" placeholder="Xác nhận mật khẩu" />
) } export default RegisterPage
